Package VideoPoker

package VideoPoker
  • Class
    Description
    Card
    Represent a playing card objets.It contains its suit, its rank and all suits and ranks that a card might have.
    DebugMode
    Class that runs the debug mode, where the poker game is fully loaded from two files and played according them
    Deck
    Represent a deck of 52 cards
    DoubleBonus
    Class that implements the Video Poker variant double bonus
    Hand
    Represents a hand of a player, with five cards and all the actions associated to it
    Illegal
    Class that checks if the commands of the game are legal
    MainClass
    Main class that will implement the Double Bonus 10/7 variant of the Video Poker game
    Player
    Represents an actual player, who can interact with the game.
    PlayingCardException
    It is used for errors/exceptions related to Card and Deck objects
    Rules
    Abstract class that implements the rules for Video Poker variant double bonus and gives the advices to play the perfect strategy
    SimulationMode
    Simulation mode is where the game is automatically played with a perfect strategy in order to understand the average gain in the playerâ€™s credit.
